fullText: The musical captures the slick professionalism and manufactured glamour of the K-pop industry, but struggles to find its own authentic voice beneath the glossy surface.
dtliExcerpt: The musical captures the slick professionalism and manufactured glamour of the K-pop industry, but struggles to find its own authentic voice beneath the glossy surface.
